ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Proc Level minimums added to tinkered items?!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, the eyepatches have a level limit.  I don t know if the watchman armor does or not.  They haven t gone back and added limits to the other stuff,
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Feb 07, 2001 at 07:58:43PM -0000, Talis wrote:
> I haven't thoroughly tested it yet but I've had 2 reports back from
> twinked newbies stating that they could not use the effect from the
> telescopic eyepatches.

Yeah, the eyepatches have a level limit. I don't know if the watchman armor
does or not. They haven't gone back and added limits to the other stuff,
though.

Eyepatches are a joke. Use spyglasses.

Most of tinkering is a joke right now. I got my skill to 135 via power
gloves and catapults, and it's going to sit there until more items get added
that will raise it, and that are realistically able to be built.

Side note: getting to the point where I could make the 60 or so bows I
needed for the catapults got my fletching up to 182. Heh. I just might
spend some time and get it to 200, just for grins.

Pasketti of Pover
